name: Complain Destroyer
description:
This game is made in PirateJam  2018 which theme is INTERVENTION.

***  Story  ***

There couples of complain in city. 

Prisoner unhappy, guards unhappy and unemployed unhappy too.

The prison gonna to lost control and the government just figure out a

 win-win solution........

*** Target ***

Help to run the prison to prevent chaos.

*** Control ***

Use mouse left-button to choose character/target
